descriptionHtml:
[B][size=+1][color=yellow]DESCRIPTION[/B][/size][/color]

I have received permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/813611/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Neovinci[/url] to convert this armor [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36431/?]Mandu by Neo[/url] to the wonderful SeveNBase Body.

This armor supports weightslider.

Tools I had used: 3DSMax 2012, NifSkope and Outfit studio.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/W1jp8Rol.jpg[/IMG]


[B][size=+1][color=yellow]REQUIREMENTS[/B][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36431/?]Mandu by Neo[/url] by Meister aka Neovinci
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url] by xp32


[B][size=+1][color=yellow]INSTALLATION[/B][/size][/color]

Per Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) or Manual.

[u]NMM:[/u]
1: install the above mods (REQUIREMENTS) first.
2: I think you know how to do it.
3: Confirm to overwrite the old meshes.
4: Done ;)

[u]Manual:[/u]
1: install the above mods (REQUIREMENTS) first.
2: download the file(s) (choose one, with or without shoulder)
3: extract the zip file
4: copy the unzipped files to: "Skyrim -> Data -> meshes -> NEO -> Mandu -> F" and confirm to overwrite the old meshes.
5: Done ;)


[B][size=+1][color=yellow]Known Issues or Bugs[/B][/size][/color]
- clipping in several poses


[B][size=+1][color=yellow]Special Thanks and Credits[/B][/size][/color]

Neovinci for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36431/?]Mandu by Neo[/url]
Caliente for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]
Crosscrusade, DeMoNhUnTeR1986, Sevennity for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url]
xp32 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
Bethesda for this wonderful game Skyrim
And all the other modders with their great modifications !!!


[B][size=+1][color=red]This Mod is NEXUSMODS.COM exclusive.
You can do whatever with it for personal usage.
It's not free for other's Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without the Permission from Neovinci.[/B][/size][/color]
author: Akiva
